Reviews.Title: Condition NOT as advertised
Reviews.Author: hornet6
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone from a third party through Amazon.  It was used which I was fully aware of.  However, the phone was advertised to be in VERY GOOD condition.  After receiving this phone I found that it would not function unless plugged into a charger.  That's even after charging overnight and trying multiple different batteries.  The vendor claimed after he got it back that it works, but I think he was just covering his a$$.  I have become very tentative about buying products from third parties through Amazon as this only one of several recent bad experiences/returns.  At least I did get a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Unauthorized Charger Error
Reviews.Author: David Greenbaum "CEO, Axiom"
Reviews.Content: Most chargers I try to use with this phone -- EVEN MOTOROLA CHARGERS -- give an "Unauthorized Charger Error". This is a great reason to never buy a Motorola phone. This is a BIG problem with Motorola phones. Have almost no such issues with other brands.
